body_html: I think probably the main blocker to replacing IndexedSlices with SparseTensor is making gather_nd as fast as gather (it's probably already pretty close), and making scatter_nd as fast as scatter (here there's a lot of room for improvement - it's slower than scatter when handling large blocks).

body: I think probably the main blocker to replacing `IndexedSlices` with `SparseTensor` is making `gather_nd` as fast as `gather` (it's probably already pretty close), and making `scatter_nd` as fast as `scatter` (here there's a lot of room for improvement - it's slower than `scatter` when handling large blocks).
